Description:
CITY VIEWS ON 5,155M2 BLOCK!
Consisting of 4 bedrooms (master with ensuite, walk in robes & other 3 bedrooms with BIRS ). Its other features include formal lounge area, kitchen with laminex bench tops, plenty of bench & cupboard space, dishwasher, pantry and adjoining meals area, central bathroom with bath & shower and separate laundry. The home also includes gas heating, split system for cooling, alfresco, double lockup garage, and a generous sized rear yard with established gardens.
If you're looking for an affordable and well-kept family home in a convenient location then look no further. Situated within close proximity to local primary/secondary schools, Green brook & Westfield Plenty Valley Shopping Centre's, parklands, public transport, sporting facilities and so much more making this a MUST SEE property !
Insights: 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Split Level Home in Handy Court Location
An affordable brick veneer home with heaps of potential. Just add your own inspiration and renovate to your heart's delight. Alternatively just move in and enjoy the handy location. Hop skip and jump to Greenbrook Shopping Centre, short stroll to Epping Train Station and Pacific Epping Shopping Centre. On offer are three bedrooms, a split level lounge dining area with cathedral ceiling, a modern Tassie oak kitchen and meals area. Double carport with remote roller door that leads to a lock up garage.
First home buyers and investors register your interest today !

Description:
An Abundance of Space!
Ideally located close to established schools, local shops and all other amenities in sought after Lyndarum Epping, this quality home offers flexible accommodation with 3 separate living zones! A formal lounge to the front, spacious main family room in the central open hub of the home enjoying a generous meals area and accommodating kitchen that features stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. The rear of the home provides a huge rumpus/theatre or entertaining room for you to enjoy. With a further 4 bedrooms on offer that include a sizable master with ensuite & walk in wardrobe make this the ideal home for the growing family or first home buyer. An alfresco area, plenty of backyard space, shed, double car garage with internal and external access, Ducted heated & cooling and plenty of storage make this home a must see.

Description:
Quality Family Living - Over 30 squares - Under Offer
Under Offer
With beautiful living spaces and display home presentation, this much-loved home delivers a wonderful family lifestyle in what is arguably one of the best locations in the prestigious " Horizons Estate ".
On 570m2 of land and over 30 squares, both Formal and Informal living areas merge to create exceptional contemporary living. Featuring a grand formal entry with feature bulkhead ceilings, Study, a master bedroom with a luxury ensuite including spa and massive Walk in robe whilst the 2nd, 3rd and 4th bedrooms share the family bathroom. Also a spacious formal lounge for all occasions, and an impressive "expansive" kitchen with walk-in pantry and oversize bench spaces overlooking the massive meals/family/living area with an adjoining 3rd living/rumpus room.
Add to this a remote double garage with additional storage area and internal access, 2 x Concrete pattern paved al-fresco areas, ducted heating/cooling, 2 split system units, low maintenance gardens and more.
With Lyndarum Village, the new Aurora Village, schools, parklands and transport just moments away, this Blue-Ribbon property is the one you've been waiting for . In a word, perfect!!!!!

Description:
BRAND NEW & READY TO MOVE INTO
Beautifully positioned with a leafy park outlook. These two separate low maintenance terrace homes, offer easy care living for the first home buyer, investor or those looking to downsize. Turn key ready. Simply move in, unpack & enjoy. Each home features 2 generous BRs, BIRs, split system heat /cool, quality carpets, lovely tiling, window furnishings, alarm, bright spacious bathroom, fully equipped kitchen / meals that flows out to the landscaped courtyard. Only moments to Epping Pacific, Lyndarum Shopping, schools & transport. Be quick to inspect.....

Great First Home or Investment!
Inspiring with internal appeal, this two-bedroom townhouse set in a quiet, yet convenient location is sure to impress. The ideal first home or smart investment property with the luxury of no body corporate fees.
- Two large bedrooms with walk in robes
- Separate lounge/sitting room
- Stunning white kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Light filled meals area
- Secured carport with remote roller door
- Large, low maintenance court yard

Description:
Outstanding Family Home with Park Frontage
Brilliant family home with park frontage will win your heart the moment you step in. It offers abundance of natural light, space and a free flowing open living floorplan. Once you step it will impress you with its quality features and three spacious bedrooms including master suite with WIR and full ensuite, two other generous size bedrooms with BIR, well served by central bathroom. An inviting and stylish kitchen that includes quality S/S appliances with stone benchtops and walk in pantry, overlooking family and the meals area leading to alfresco with lockable shutters for extra privacy.
Add to this the quality features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional split system in master suite, CCTV and alarm system, security shutters on all the windows, polished hard wood flooring, storage shed, double lock up garage and a generous low maintenance backyard. Within walking distance to Aurora shopping village, bus stop, multiple schools, childcare, shops and a short drive to Epping
train station, Epping shopping plaza and Northern Hospital. Inspections by appointment only.

Description:
Light Filled Parkside Living in Most Desirable Location
Amazing location next to parklands, walking distance to Epping Views Primary school, Epping North
shopping precinct, Health & leisure centre, childcare and public transport in much sought after
Lyndarum. Only a few minutes drive to Epping station, Northern Hospital, Pacific Epping and many
more. This impeccably presented home boasts a superb modern design to deliver an outstanding
lifestyle appeal. The lower level includes spacious open living meals integrating a modern kitchen
fitted with upmarket stainless steel appliances and opening to a private entertainers backyard,
includes large pergola and a low maintenance garden setting. First floor comprises a large second
living area, main bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe and a central bathroom serving the
other two spacious bedrooms.
- No body corp fees
- Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robes
- Two other spacious bedrooms with built in robes
- Full ensuite, central bathroom and powder room
- Large private entertainer's backyard
- Double garage / flexible entertaining space
- Split system climate control units in all the bedrooms and in Living area.
- Landscaped low maintenance backyard

Description:
Open-Plan is the Best Plan
Whether youre looking for an undeniably stylish first home, a savvy investment opportunity or an irresistible lock-and-leave, 12 Prism Walk in Epping has you covered. Located in a 6-star estate this 3-bed, 2-bath home brings to the fore the concepts of comfort and convenience, all in a solidly-built package.
The bold façade combines elements of timber, exposed brick and render in a tantalising manner, inviting you indoors where youll be met by the three surprisingly large bedrooms. Lush carpeting, stylish feature walls and bucket loads of natural light add a touch of luxury, which is ably complemented by the walk-in-robes to each room and the full ensuite to the master. A second, main bathroom has a bathtub and shower, and the separate internal laundry is a well-thought-out touch.
The open-plan kitchen is spacious and contemporary, with ample bench space, high ceilings and all the mod-cons you may need. It adjoins the living and meals area, which in term open out onto one of the standout features of the home: the covered, decked entertaining area. Spacious and eye-catching, this is destined to be the social centre of the home. A set of stairs takes you down to the double remote garage, accessed via a private laneway at the back.
Well insulated, with ducted heating and split-system cooling, this property is equipped for all seasons. Its located directly across the road from up-market tennis courts (free to use!), and there are a number of parks, schools and shops within easy reach.
A home like this with fibre-optic internet and no body corporate fees wont be on the market long!
Insights: 12 Prism Walk, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
An Abundance of Space!
Introducing a unique opportunity that has something for everyone, whether you are a first home buyer looking to leap into the market place in style or an investor with a keen eye for what makes an investment property a lucrative asset.
With three large bedrooms master featuring walk in robe and ensuite accompanied by multiple sun intrusive spacious living zones, this really is an opportunity that stands out from the rest. Combined with an open plan dining and generous sized kitchen fitted with a dishwasher and 900mm Blanco appliances the lucky occupant will really be able to appreciate the layout that has been meticulously designed to put a strong focus on use of space and privacy.
Other features include Ducted heating and Evaporative cooling, alarm system, CCTV, double lock up garage with rear access and an outdoor covered entertainment area that is ideal for entertaining guests.
All tightly packaged within close proximity to public transport, schools, shops and parkland. This property you must inspect!

Description:
The Luck of the Horseshoe
This stunning family residence that has been impeccably renovated with designer finishes, in one of Eppings' most desirable locations. Offering 3 spacious bedrooms, a stylish bathroom, an expansive lounge area adjoining a formal lounge and open plan kitchen/meals. Sliding doors open out to a beautiful courtyard alongside a entertaining area/carport.
Set within a family friendly neighbourhood walking distance to Meadow Glen Primary School, the bus stop and the local shopping strip and within a short drive or bus trip to Epping station, Epping Plaza and Westfield South Morang.
Renovated with modern finishes
Relaxed lifestyle, inner city living
Separate laundry with access to rear yard
Large living zones, formal dining and separative living area.
Amazing open plan kitchen-meals area, contemporary kitchen with stainless steel gas cook top oven, dishwasher and maximum storage and counter space
Undercover carport plus car space for two cars behind secure gated door.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling system
Professionally landscaped gardens with undercover entertaining area
Secure gate around the entire property

Description:
SOLD FOR $597,000 BY STEVE GRUEVSKI 0402 941 954
"Simply Stunning" and tastefully updated with a great blend of indoor and outdoor living and within a sensational location only a stone throw Shops including Westfield, schools, transport this home is sure to appeal to the most fastidious of buyers.
There are three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with spacious ensuite with a separate shower, formal entry leading into a spacious lounge dining area/dining area, separate updated kitchen with classy stone bench tops and high quality euro appliances / meals family room that overlooks the alfresco and rear yard.
The home sits pretty on a large parcel of land ideal for those who need side drive access for their caravans, Jetski or boats, and a double car accommodation with ample drive way parking. There is a lovely covered decked pergola area allows BBQ's all year round that complements the fully landscaped front and back yard and fabulous family friendly quiet location that sets this home apart from the rest.
Blessed with an abundance of features including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, timber floors to the living areas, white kitchen with built in pantry, fresh renovated bathrooms, open plan living areas and neutral colour scheme throughout. Suitable for those who can see huge upside potential in the near future including astute home buyers, downsizes and investors. Opportunity not to be missed.
- Stunning renovations throughout/move in and enjoy
- Beautiful tree lined street ideal for families/walk to schools
- Attractive facade with loads of space and rear access
- Amazing kitchen area with waterfall stone benchtops
- Terms 10 % Deposit balance 90 Days

Description:
Extensive Possibilities
Be inspired to step inside and make this home your own. Comfortable as is with scope to add your own improvements overtime or re-develop (STCA) in an established part of Epping close to local schools and shops and easy access to Westfield Plenty Valley, Epping and South Morang train stations, Pacific Epping and Northern Hospital.
On a 530m2 allotment, this home offers a functional design incorporating three bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom and separate laundry. The kitchen/dining and lounge lead out to a covered patio and large backyard with storage shed.
An array of possibilities present themselves with this property. Put in some elbow grease and inspiration and create your own oasis, re-develop (STCA) or add to your portfolio with this sound investment. The choice is yours, but act quickly.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
THE MONEY OR THE BOX
Townhouses this large are rare to find. Walking distance to Epping football oval and Epping Secondary College located on McDonalds road You can have it all! Comprising; 3 large bedrooms, full ensuite to the master bedroom and built in robes in beds 2 and 3. Separate lounge room downstairs and a bright & open kitchen meals area with a spacious 2nd sitting area, ample storage including under the stairs, ducted heating, split system, double car garage with internal access & low maintenance yard. Open plan living awaits! Positioned in a quiet residential pocket, Proportioned for comfort & convenience & Potential for all! Let it be you! Current rent on a periodic tenancy $1,521 per calendar month.

Description:
RENOVATED DELIGHT! GREAT LOCATION!
This renovated gem provides your family all the space it needs to thrive with this big and spacious family home! The location is a firm favourite for good reason, boasting a coveted position within walking distance of Epping train station, Epping primary school, bus services and high street shops. Set on a large 702sqm (approx.) allotment, this bright and beautiful residence is also designed around family living with its multiple living zones, four bedrooms, formal lounge and two excellent bathrooms! Enjoy splendid backyard views from the light-filled outdoor entertainment area whilst curling up in front of the fireplace, which connects with the adjacent family area to create an elegant space to entertain. Finished to the highest standards of workmanship, this beautifully appointed home also offers :
Second Kitchen in the outdoor entertainment area
Wood fire pizza oven
Ducted heating
Air conditioning
Security cameras
Glass Splash back
900 mm S/S appliances inc D/W
Grassed backyard for the kids to play
Undercover carport
Double garage
Storage Shed
and much more!
Conveniently located within minutes of Epping Plaza, Northern hospital, Costco and easy access to Metropolitan Ring Road, this home ticks all the boxes!
